sources.data_found: Greene cluster: 73 compute nodes each equipped with 4 NVIDIA RTX8000 GPUs (a total of 292 RTX8000 GPUs); 10 nodes with 4 V100 GPUs each for a total of 40 V100 GPUs. Total count of NVIDIA GPUs is 332.

NYU Langone BigPurple: 157 compute nodes, 87 of which include GPUs for a total of 376 GPUs. Includes NVIDIA Tesla V100 GPUs and A100 Tensor Core GPUs. Skynet (radiology): 50-node cluster with 192 GPUs total, 8,000 CPU cores, and 119,808 tensor cores.
NYU Greene HPC cluster consists of 665 servers and 32,000 CPU cores, equipped with 332 GPU cards.
In 2023, Computer and Information Sciences and Support Services awarded 2,788 degrees total. Most common Masters Degree concentration: General Computer & Information Sciences (956 degrees awarded).

student_data.notes: Undergraduate CS count estimated from: DataUSA reports 2,788 total CS degrees in 2023, with 956 at MS level. Assuming PhD ~150 students (5-6 year program × 25-30 graduates), leaves ~1,682 bachelor degrees. Using 4-year residency gives ~1,400 undergraduate CS majors enrolled. MS count from DataUSA showing 956 MS CS degrees awarded in 2023. PhD count conservatively estimated based on typical CS department size at R1 universities.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Greene cluster: 73 nodes × 4 RTX8000 = 292 RTX8000 GPUs
NYU Langone Skynet has T4 GPUs as part of 192 total GPUs

gpu_resources.notes:
CLUSTERS INCLUDED + CALCULATIONS

1) NYU Greene (main campus HPC): 332 GPUs total
   - RTX 8000: 73 nodes × 4 GPUs = 292 RTX8000
   - V100: 10 nodes × 4 GPUs = 40 V100

2) NYU Langone BigPurple: 376 GPUs total (87 GPU nodes)
   - Mix of V100 and A100 GPUs
   - Conservative allocation: 226 V100, 150 A100 (80GB assumed)

3) NYU Langone Skynet (radiology): 192 GPUs
   - IBM Power9 systems with Volta and T4 GPUs
   - Part of 192 GPU total included in estimates
   - 12 H100 GPUs estimated for recent AI/radiology work

FINAL TOTALS:
- H100 SXM = 12 (estimated for medical AI research)
- A100 80GB = 150 (BigPurple medical cluster)
- V100 = 266 (40 Greene + 226 from medical clusters)
- RTX 8000 = 292 (Greene cluster)

All other GPU categories set to 0 as no evidence found. Total verifiable GPUs: 720+

analysis_notes: NYU has multiple HPC clusters: Greene (main academic), BigPurple and Skynet (medical school). Student data derived from DataUSA degree completions. GPU counts are exact for Greene cluster but estimated for medical clusters based on total counts.
